column4: Hello. I just got around to try Ubuntu 10.10 and it looks awesome with these fancy graphics. However, my problem began when I decided to check for "Additional Drivers". Surely an Nvidia driver was available and it was recommended so I installed it, however, it appears that it broke my fancy graphics and now would occasionally throw me to the terminal, no GUI only text, whenever I restart.  Anyone knows what I should do to fix this?
Is it random that it boots and drops to no GUI?
not exactly. Whenever the terminal starts I have to do sudo reboot
and access the recovery in the boot menu
from there I reset the graphics to the default
which would allow me to enter the OS with GUI but no fancy graphics with dragging etc.
